author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...AIR FORCE HURRICANE HUNTERS INVESTIGATING MELISSA.. ...HEAVY RAINS EXPECTED TO SPREAD TOWARD HISPANIOLA DURING THE NEXT COUPLE OF DAYS...
summary: ...AIR FORCE HURRICANE HUNTERS INVESTIGATING MELISSA.. ...HEAVY RAINS EXPECTED TO SPREAD TOWARD HISPANIOLA DURING THE NEXT COUPLE OF DAYS... As of 2:00 PM EDT Tue Oct 21 the center of Melissa was located near 14.2, -72.6 with movement W at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...AIR FORCE HURRICANE HUNTERS INVESTIGATING MELISSA.. ...HEAVY RAINS EXPECTED TO SPREAD TOWARD HISPANIOLA DURING THE NEXT COUPLE OF DAYS... As of 2:00 PM EDT Tue Oct 21 the center of Melissa was located near 14.2, -72.6 with movement W at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
